meanings.definition: To sew over or on top of something.
meanings.sent1: She carefully oversews the patch onto the jeans.
meanings.sent2: My grandma always oversews the buttons to make sure they stay on.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy tailor oversews the fabric, creating a messy look.
meanings.sent4: Her love for detail oversews every seam, making her work stand out.
meanings.sent5: The artist oversews the threads with precision, creating a beautiful design.

meanings.definition: The act of sewing over or on top of something.
meanings.sent1: The oversews on the quilt added a unique texture.
meanings.sent2: I noticed the oversews on the hem of the dress.
meanings.sent3: The cat's playful antics resulted in oversews on the curtains.
meanings.sent4: The oversews of memories stitched together in the quilt of life.
meanings.sent5: The oversews on the pillow gave it a charming handmade look.
